title: Mobility Crunch
overview: Gerimed Mobility, Your one-stop medical supply shop. Having been in in operation for a few years it was time for them to go live. Needing both an extensive product catalog and design matching their branding efforts.

outline.goal: To provide their customers the ability to view their products and place orders online with ease.
outline.scope: An admin panel for managing products and orders and an store-front for customers to place orders.
outline.industry: Gerimed Mobility supplies its local area with all their medical needs. From hospital-beds to personal hygiene.
